_librariesioMetadata.description: Hackable file manager application on Linux, Windows and OS X

scripts.build:linux32: npm run clean:linux32 && electron-packager ./app "sulu" --out=dist --platform=linux --arch=ia32 --version=0.31.1 --icon=src/icon.ico && mv dist/sulu-linux-ia32 dist/linux32
scripts.build:linux64: npm run clean:linux64 && electron-packager ./app "sulu" --out=dist --platform=linux --arch=x64 --version=0.31.1 --icon=src/icon.ico && mv dist/sulu-linux-x64 dist/linux64
scripts.build:win32: npm run clean:win32 && electron-packager ./app "sulu" --version-string.CompanyName="suluONE" --version-string.ProductName="sulu" --version-string.OriginalFilename="sulu.exe" --version-string.InternalName="sulu" --version-string.LegalCopyright="Stephan Ahlf" --version-string.FileDescription="Hackable file manager application on Linux, Windows and OS X. https://github.com/sulu-one/sulu" --version-string.ProductVersion="0.0.1" --ignore=resources/default_app --out=dist --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=0.31.1 --icon=src/icon.ico
scripts.pack: npm run pack:macos && npm run pack:win32 && npm run pack:win64
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:win32 && npm run build:win64 && npm run build:linux32 && npm run build:linux64
scripts.copy:osx: cd dist && cd osx64 && xcopy /b /Y /E . c:\git\sulu-dist-osx64\
